metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0735 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 12.10 before 14.6.5, all versions starting from 14.7 before14.7.4, all versions starting from 14.8 before 14.8.2. An unauthorised userwas able to steal runner registration tokens through an informationdisclosure vulnerability using quick actions commands.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
